alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 21 at 4:38AM MST until February 22 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet in the Tetons, with 8 to 18 inches for most other mountain locales. Winds frequently gusting 35 to 50 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Now until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible, especially tonight and Tuesday. Widespread snow and blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. These conditions will impact commuters traveling Teton and Togwotee Passes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
